text: Jisas kumak ñɨn ak, tap dap nan gep ñɨn ak, Juda ñɨn awl ak ownɨg gak. Dugep won ak gɨnɨg gaknɨŋ, bɨ olap ne Jisas nop dam kamnɨg, ma pɨlɨkɨl Paylat yek ak amɨl agnɨgak. Bɨ anɨb ak, man sɨkol Alimateya nɨb owak, yɨb ne ak Josep. Ne Juda bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep olap mɨdɨl, bɨ teplep ak yɨb teplep yɨbɨl yolɨgup. Pen God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab ñɨn ak kod yolɨgup.
